item.title: Fly tipping, 10th July
item.description:
Fly tipping at rear of shops . This has been cleared once but obviously flytippers have discovered its a convenient dumping place. This is a fire hazzard and a health and safety issue due to rats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carlton Parade, Poverest, Orpington, London

item.title: Vehicle with extension lead, 10th July
item.description:
A vehicle which is parked outside a property in Selsey crescent has a extension lead coming from it and going into a property, this is about 4 ft high and goes across the pavement, this is very concerning not sure if someone is living in the vehicle but it has been like it for several weeks and seems lower this week, could this be looked into, in case someone gets hurt.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox in a bin bag on the pavement, 10th July
item.description:
There is a dead fox that is half in a bin bag on the pavement by a car at this location. The fox is visible and covered in flies. It is freshly dead as far as I can tell and it is very close to a public park with kids in it
Report on FixMyStreet
